metadata.title: CVE-2021-36408 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libde265 v1.0.8.There is a Heap-use-after-freein intrapred.h when decoding file using dec265.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.11-1
libde265-examples - 1.0.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.11-1').
